subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3788 is on the way
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I have decided I would like to order a few of your springs but shipping is very expensive to the UK

Is there any way I get around this as I ordered your most expensive pedal set?

Kinda regards
Luke

conversations.body_text: Hi luke H,    You may inform us of the springs you require, and we shall create a link for you with no delivery charges.

Thank you Simsonn

Please may I have one red, one blue and one green spring?

Also, do you know when your pro shifter will be back in stock or have a new version?

I've been very impressed with your customer service and am looking forward to writing a review for my pedals

Thanks
Luke



________________________________

Hi luke H,    ​You can click this link to make the payment. Remember to add a note to your order.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1   Additionally, the SQ pro shifter is undergoing upgrades and optimizations. It has already undergone about ten redesigns, and the final version has not yet been determined.
